title: Consolidate Form Definitions
content:
```json
{
  "version": "1.0",
  "academicYear": "2025-26",
  "commonFields": {
    "personalInformation": [
      {
        "fieldName": "lastName",
        "label": "Last Name (current legal name)",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Applicant's current legal last name",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Personal Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "firstName",
        "label": "First Name (current legal name)",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Applicant's current legal first name",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Personal Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "middleInitial",
        "label": "Middle Initial",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Applicant's middle initial",
        "required": false,
        "maxLength": 1,
        "section": "Personal Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "socialInsuranceNumber",
        "label": "Social Insurance Number",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "9-digit Canadian Social Insurance Number",
        "required": true,
        "format": "XXX-XXX-XXX",
        "section": "Personal Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "previousLastName",
        "label": "Previous Last Name (if applicable)",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Former last name if changed",
        "required": false,
        "section": "Personal Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "dateOfBirth",
        "label": "Date of Birth",
        "dataType": "date",
        "description": "Applicant's date of birth",
        "required": true,
        "format": "YYYY-MM-DD",
        "section": "Personal Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "gender",
        "label": "Gender",
        "dataType": "select",
        "description": "Gender identification",
        "required": true,
        "acceptableValues": ["Male", "Female", "X"],
        "notes": "Choose X if you do not identify as male or female, or choose to self-identify as X",
        "section": "Personal Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "albertaStudentNumber",
        "label": "Alberta Student Number (mandatory)",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Unique identifier for Alberta students",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Personal Information"
      }
    ],
    "contactInformation": [
      {
        "fieldName": "apartmentOrBoxNumber",
        "label": "Apartment or Box Number",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Apartment or PO Box number",
        "required": false,
        "section": "Contact Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "streetAddress",
        "label": "Street Address (add direction, e.g. S, NW, SE, if applicable)",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Street address with directional indicators",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Contact Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "city",
        "label": "City or Town",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "City or town of residence",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Contact Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "province",
        "label": "Province/State",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Province or state of residence",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Contact Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "country",
        "label": "Country",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Country of residence",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Contact Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "postalCode",
        "label": "Postal/Zip Code",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Postal or ZIP code",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Contact Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "mobileNumber",
        "label": "Mobile Number",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Mobile phone number",
        "required": false,
        "section": "Contact Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "telephoneNumber",
        "label": "Telephone Number",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Landline or alternate phone number",
        "required": false,
        "section": "Contact Information"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "emailAddress",
        "label": "Email Address (mandatory)",
        "dataType": "email",
        "description": "Primary email address for correspondence",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Contact Information"
      }
    ],
    "citizenshipAndResidency": [
      {
        "fieldName": "citizenshipStatus",
        "label": "Citizenship Status",
        "dataType": "select",
        "description": "Immigration status in Canada",
        "required": true,
        "acceptableValues": ["Canadian", "Permanent Resident", "Protected Person", "VISA (International Student)"],
        "section": "Citizenship and Residency"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "protectedPersonDocumentation",
        "label": "Protected Person Documentation",
        "dataType": "attachment",
        "description": "Required if Protected Person status selected",
        "required": false,
        "acceptableValues": ["Copy of SIN card AND (Notice of Decision OR Verification of Status Document)"],
        "conditionalOn": "citizenshipStatus === 'Protected Person'",
        "section": "Citizenship and Residency"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "albertaResidencyParentGuardian",
        "label": "Did you or one of your parents or legal guardian live in Alberta for at least 12 consecutive months immediately prior to commencing post-secondary studies?",
        "dataType": "boolean",
        "description": "Alberta residency determination (excludes time attending post-secondary or vacations)",
        "required": true,
        "acceptableValues": ["Yes", "No"],
        "section": "Citizenship and Residency"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "albertaResidencySpousePartner",
        "label": "If No, was your spouse/partner an Alberta resident immediately prior to you commencing post-secondary studies?",
        "dataType": "boolean",
        "description": "Alternative Alberta residency qualification",
        "required": false,
        "acceptableValues": ["Yes", "No"],
        "conditionalOn": "albertaResidencyParentGuardian === 'No'",
        "section": "Citizenship and Residency"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "indigenousStatus",
        "label": "Indigenous Status",
        "dataType": "select",
        "description": "Indigenous heritage declaration (voluntary unless required for specific awards)",
        "required": false,
        "acceptableValues": [
          "Status Indian/First Nations",
          "Non-Status Indian/First Nations",
          "Métis",
          "Inuit",
          "Not applicable"
        ],
        "section": "Citizenship and Residency"
      }
    ],
    "postSecondaryEnrolment": [
      {
        "fieldName": "postSecondaryInstitutionName",
        "label": "Post-Secondary Institution Name",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Name of post-secondary institution currently attending",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "studentIdNumber",
        "label": "Student ID Number",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Institution-specific student identification number",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "institutionAddress",
        "label": "Address",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Street address of institution",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "institutionCity",
        "label": "City or Town",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "City or town of institution",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "institutionProvince",
        "label": "Province/State",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Province or state of institution",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "institutionCountry",
        "label": "Country",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Country of institution",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "institutionPostalCode",
        "label": "Postal/Zip Code",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Postal or ZIP code of institution",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "programOfStudy",
        "label": "Program of Study",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Name of academic program",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "programStartDate",
        "label": "Program of Study Start Date",
        "dataType": "date",
        "description": "Date program commenced",
        "required": true,
        "format": "YYYY-MM",
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "anticipatedCompletionDate",
        "label": "Anticipated Date of Completion",
        "dataType": "date",
        "description": "Expected program completion date",
        "required": true,
        "format": "YYYY-MM",
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "programLengthYears",
        "label": "Program Length (Years)",
        "dataType": "integer",
        "description": "Number of years in program",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "programLengthMonths",
        "label": "Program Length (Months)",
        "dataType": "integer",
        "description": "Additional months in program beyond full years",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "yearOfProgram",
        "label": "Year of Program",
        "dataType": "integer",
        "description": "Current year in program (e.g., 1st, 2nd, 3rd)",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "levelOfStudy",
        "label": "Level of Study",
        "dataType": "select",
        "description": "Academic level of current program",
        "required": true,
        "acceptableValues": [
          "Undergraduate",
          "Master Level",
          "Ph.D Level",
          "Professional Program (e.g. medicine, veterinary medicine, optometry, etc.)"
        ],
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "expectedCredential",
        "label": "Expected Credential",
        "dataType": "text",
        "description": "Type of credential to be awarded",
        "required": true,
        "examples": ["upgrading", "transfer", "degree", "diploma", "certificate", "other"],
        "section": "Post-Secondary Enrolment"
      }
    ],
    "declaration": [
      {
        "fieldName": "signatureDate",
        "label": "Date",
        "dataType": "date",
        "description": "Date of application signature",
        "required": true,
        "format": "yyyy-mm-dd",
        "section": "Declaration"
      },
      {
        "fieldName": "applicantSignature",
        "label": "Signature of Applicant",
        "dataType": "signature",
        "description": "Applicant's signature affirming declarations",
        "required": true,
        "section": "Declaration"
      }
    ]
  },
  "scholarships": [
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12646",
      "scholarshipName": "Adult High School Equivalency Scholarship",
      "formCode": "ASA12646",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": [
        {
          "fieldName": "dateLastAttendedHighSchool",
          "label": "Date Last Attended High School",
          "dataType": "date",
          "description": "Last date applicant attended high school before entering high school equivalency program",
          "required": true,
          "format": "YYYY-MM-DD"
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolEquivalencyProgramStartDate",
          "label": "Date High School Equivalency Program Began",
          "dataType": "date",
          "description": "Date when applicant began high school equivalency program",
          "required": true,
          "format": "YYYY-MM-DD"
        }
      ],
      "requiredDocuments": [
        {
          "documentName": "officialTranscript",
          "description": "Official transcript of the high school equivalency program taken",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "documentName": "nominationLetter",
          "description": "Nomination letter from the institution where the high school equivalency program was completed",
          "required": true
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12647",
      "scholarshipName": "Arts Graduate Scholarship",
      "formCode": "ASA12647",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": [
        {
          "fieldName": "facultyDepartmentName",
          "label": "Faculty/Department Name",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Name of the faculty or department at current institution",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "facultyAdvisorName",
          "label": "Faculty Advisor Name",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Name of the faculty advisor",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "deanOfGraduateFacultyName",
          "label": "Dean of Graduate Faculty Name",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Name of the Dean of Graduate Faculty",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "isThesisBased",
          "label": "Is Master's/Ph.D program thesis based?",
          "dataType": "boolean",
          "description": "Indicates whether the graduate program is thesis-based",
          "required": true,
          "acceptableValues": ["Yes", "No"]
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "thesisProjectTitle",
          "label": "Thesis/Project Title",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Title of the thesis or project (if applicable)",
          "required": false
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highestDegreeCompleted",
          "label": "Highest Degree Completed",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Highest academic degree previously completed",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highestDegreeInstitution",
          "label": "Highest Degree Completed at (Institution Name)",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Institution where highest degree was completed",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highestDegreeProgramOfStudy",
          "label": "Highest Degree - Program of Study",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Program of study for highest degree completed",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "academicTranscriptsInstitutions",
          "label": "Academic Transcripts - Institutions Providing Transcripts",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "List of institutions providing academic transcripts",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "titleOfProposedProgram",
          "label": "Title of Proposed Program of Study",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Title of the proposed program of study",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "otherScholarships",
          "label": "Other Scholarships - List",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "List of other scholarships for which applicant is applying",
          "required": false
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "essayQuestionResponse",
          "label": "Essay Question Response",
          "dataType": "textarea",
          "description": "Detailed description of proposed program of study, research/creative activity rationale, and plans (2 pages maximum, single-spaced, font size minimum 10)",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "reference1Name",
          "label": "Reference 1 - Name",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Name of first reference provider",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "reference1Institution",
          "label": "Reference 1 - Institution",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Institution of first reference provider",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "reference1Position",
          "label": "Reference 1 - Position Held",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Position held by first reference provider",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "reference2Name",
          "label": "Reference 2 - Name",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Name of second reference provider",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "reference2Institution",
          "label": "Reference 2 - Institution",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Institution of second reference provider",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "reference2Position",
          "label": "Reference 2 - Position Held",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Position held by second reference provider",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "ableToAcceptScholarship",
          "label": "Able to Accept Scholarship",
          "dataType": "boolean",
          "description": "Confirmation of ability to accept scholarship if successful",
          "required": true,
          "acceptableValues": ["Yes", "No"]
        }
      ],
      "requiredDocuments": [
        {
          "documentName": "officialTranscripts",
          "description": "Official transcripts from all institutions attended with official signature or seal",
          "format": "Paper with official seal (photocopies and faxed copies not accepted)"
        },
        {
          "documentName": "resume",
          "description": "Must include: all universities/colleges/technical institutes attended; scholarships/awards/achievements; publications; performances/exhibitions with dates and locations"
        },
        {
          "documentName": "twoReferenceLetters",
          "description": "Must include: applicant's name and award name; program of study; research (if applicable); accomplishments"
        },
        {
          "documentName": "essayResponse",
          "description": "Two pages maximum, single-spaced, font size minimum 10"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12626",
      "scholarshipName": "Anna and John Kolesar Memorial Scholarship",
      "formCode": "ASA12626",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": [
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolName",
          "label": "Name of High School (graduating/graduated from high school)",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Name of high school attended",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolCity",
          "label": "High School City/Town",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "City or town of high school",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolProvince",
          "label": "High School Province/State",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Province or state of high school",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolCountry",
          "label": "High School Country",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Country of high school",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolPostalCode",
          "label": "High School Postal/ZIP Code",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Postal or ZIP code of high school",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "graduationDate",
          "label": "Graduation Date",
          "dataType": "date",
          "description": "High school graduation date (2025)",
          "required": true,
          "format": "YYYY-MM"
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "parentUniversityDegree",
          "label": "Have either of your parents obtained a university degree?",
          "dataType": "boolean",
          "description": "Indicates whether either parent has obtained a university degree",
          "required": true,
          "acceptableValues": ["Yes", "No"],
          "notes": "Must answer 'No' to be eligible"
        }
      ],
      "requiredDocuments": [
        {
          "documentName": "albertaTranscript",
          "description": "Alberta Transcript of High School Achievement showing final standings"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12624",
      "scholarshipName": "Eugene Boyko Memorial Scholarship",
      "formCode": "ASA12624",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": [
        {
          "fieldName": "cropRelatedCourses",
          "label": "Please list the crop-related courses you are enrolled in for the current academic year and explain how your program of study is related to crop production and/or crop processing technology",
          "dataType": "textarea",
          "description": "Detailed explanation of crop-related coursework and program relevance",
          "required": true
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12623",
      "scholarshipName": "Charles S. Noble Scholarship for Study at Harvard College",
      "formCode": "ASA12623",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": []
    },
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12625",
      "scholarshipName": "Alberta Excellence in Agriculture Scholarship",
      "formCode": "ASA12625",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": []
    },
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12631",
      "scholarshipName": "Jo-Anne Koch for Bright Children Society Scholarship",
      "formCode": "ASA12631",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": []
    },
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12648",
      "scholarshipName": "Janet and Horace Allen Science Scholarship",
      "formCode": "ASA12648",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": [
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolName",
          "label": "Name of High School (graduating/graduated from high school)",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Name of high school attended",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolStreetAddress",
          "label": "High School Street Address",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Street address of high school",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolPOBox",
          "label": "High School PO BOX",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "PO Box of high school if applicable",
          "required": false
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolCity",
          "label": "High School City or Town",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "City or town of high school",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolProvince",
          "label": "High School Province/State",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Province or state of high school",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolPostalCode",
          "label": "High School Postal/Zip Code",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Postal or ZIP code of high school",
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "graduationDate",
          "label": "Graduation Date",
          "dataType": "date",
          "description": "High school graduation date (2025)",
          "required": true,
          "format": "YYYY-MM"
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "crowsnestStudent",
          "label": "Are you a student at Crowsnest Consolidated High School?",
          "dataType": "boolean",
          "description": "Indicates attendance at Crowsnest Consolidated High School",
          "required": true,
          "acceptableValues": ["Yes", "No"]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12632",
      "scholarshipName": "Helen and George Kilik Scholarship",
      "formCode": "ASA12632",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": [
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolName",
          "label": "Name of High School (Graduating/Graduated from High School)",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Name of high school attended",
          "required": true,
          "defaultValue": "École Olds High School"
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolStreetAddress",
          "label": "High School Street Address",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Street address of high school",
          "required": true,
          "defaultValue": "4500-50 Street"
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolCity",
          "label": "High School City/Town",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "City or town of high school",
          "required": true,
          "defaultValue": "Olds"
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolProvince",
          "label": "High School Province/State",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Province or state of high school",
          "required": true,
          "defaultValue": "AB"
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "highSchoolPostalCode",
          "label": "High School Postal/ZIP Code",
          "dataType": "text",
          "description": "Postal or ZIP code of high school",
          "required": true,
          "defaultValue": "T4H 1P5"
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "graduationDate",
          "label": "Graduation Date",
          "dataType": "date",
          "description": "High school graduation date (2025)",
          "required": true,
          "format": "YYYY-MM"
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "attendedAllGradesAtEcole",
          "label": "Did you attend École Olds High School for all of your high school grades?",
          "dataType": "boolean",
          "description": "Indicates full attendance at École Olds High School",
          "required": true,
          "acceptableValues": ["Yes", "No"]
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "parentUniversityDegree",
          "label": "Have either of your parents obtained a university degree?",
          "dataType": "boolean",
          "description": "Indicates if either parent has a university degree",
          "required": true,
          "acceptableValues": ["Yes", "No"]
        },
        {
          "fieldName": "accomplishments",
          "label": "Highlights of Recipient's Accomplishments",
          "dataType": "textarea",
          "description": "Free-text description of achievements and accomplishments",
          "required": false
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "scholarshipId": "ASA12641",
      "scholarshipName": "Federation of Agriculture Scholarship",
      "formCode": "ASA12641",
      "revision": "2025-07",
      "specificFields": [

```

## Key Design Decisions:

1. **Common Fields Structure**: Organized into logical sections (Personal Information, Contact Information, Citizenship and Residency, Post-Secondary Enrolment, Declaration)

2. **Scholarship-Specific Fields**: Each scholarship has its own array of unique fields with scholarship metadata (ID, name, form code, revision)

3. **Consistent Field Schema**: All fields follow the same structure with `fieldName`, `label`, `dataType`, `description`, `required`, and optional properties like `acceptableValues`, `format`, `conditionalOn`

4. **Required Documents**: Each scholarship includes its specific document requirements

5. **Reusability**: The common fields are defined once and can be reused across all scholarship applications

This structure allows your application to:
- Collect common data once per user
- Display scholarship-specific fields only when a user selects that scholarship
- Maintain consistency across all forms
- Easily add new scholarships by adding entries to the `scholarships` array
